S:log-item.D:comment: LUCENE-4160: Bring back the functional equivalent of tests.iters.min. Added two properties: -Dtests.maxfailures=M and -Dtests.failfast=[true/false/yes/no/on/off] which control skipping tests after the first M failures have been hit or after the first failure (failfast is an alias for tests.maxfailures=1).
